data.eml:eml: A new species of Noblella (Anura: Craugastoridae) from the Amazonian Slopes of the Ecuadorian Andes with Comments on Noblella lochites (Lynch)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Harvey, Michael B., Almendáriz, Ana, Brito, Jorge, Batallas, Diego (2013): A new species of Noblella (Anura: Craugastoridae) from the Amazonian Slopes of the Ecuadorian Andes with Comments on Noblella lochites (Lynch). Zootaxa 3635 (1): 1-14, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3635.1.1
